name: A stressful Descent
description:
Story:

You are walking home after a tiring day of school. Your math teacher just announced that you will have a test in 3 days. You have not studied. The amount of stress makes you close your eyes and run. You forget your school was pretty high up a mountain. You feel a large fence collide with your stomach. You open your eyes, revealing that you just flipped off the mountain and now you are flying down the cliff. You remember what your mother told you. “If you ever fall down this mountain, remember. It is magical, solve puzzles to survive.”

Control:

A,D to move

Space to summon platform

Win:

Pass 3 levels and summon a golden rock for safe landing.

Lose:

if get hit by Bear or reach the end without summoning golden rock

Team:

Designers: Max Mao, Max Lay

Artists: Joy, Eesta (Character Artists) Molly, Serena(Environment Artists)

Programmer: Tom

Made in 72 hours

Theme: Pausing Has Consequences
